query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks) as total_us_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks WHERE isActive = 1) as active_us_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM usStockPrices) as us_stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM usStockPrices) as latest_price_date,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStockPrices WHERE date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM usStockPrices)) as latest_day_records
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3tyUrnEAZmgrWaW.7957998e07fb --database KzRzifpe7R9Hr8c3sVfR6n --execute 
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks) as total_us_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks WHERE isActive = 1) as active_us_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM usStockPrices) as us_stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM usStockPrices) as latest_price_date,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStockPrices WHERE date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM usStockPrices)) as latest_day_records
